boardgame.name: Abracadabra
Du Balai!
Flinke Feger
Streghe Volanti
Wicked Witches Way
Zlot Czarownic
boardgame.description: From the Publisher:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Wicked Witches Way is a board game which will put you in command of a flying witches broom that you will have to control with daring and mastery._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Your goal? Win the race by passing the finish line first! Spot the dice, recreate the proper formula and advance... But don't forget that two kinds of combinations are possible, depending on the color: orange and its turbo mode, or black, with its special cards filled with spells and sneaky tricks! The choice is yours! Memory, audacity, and cunning will be your best assets to take the victory._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

listing.notes: We only sell brand new, shrinkwrapped games. International shipping available. Edition: Asmodee Editions (2007) ASMDB01US

SELLERS TERMS AND CONDITIONS: Check item description and request any additional information to verify condition or age, before placing your bid. The item_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s description is based on my opinion and is described to the best of my ability. All dates and ages of items listed are approximate to the best of my knowledge. All items are sold as is and all sales are considered final. By bidding on this item you are agreeing to the above mentioned terms and conditions. Used items are sold as is, so please read description carefully and ask any questions before buying. PAYMENT TERMS: Payment is due within 7 days of the end of the auction. Please do not purchase if you do not intend to pay, or cannot pay within this time frame. PAYMENT METHODS: Preferred payment is PayPal, but will accept cashier_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s checks or money orders. I DO NOT accept personal checks. If you choose to pay by cashier check or money order, please include item number. SHIPPING: Buyer is responsible for all shipping cost. INSURANCE: Insurance is optional on all items, unless noted. RETURNS: New Unopened items may be returned for a refund of the purchase price of the item, excluding shipping charges, within 7 days of the delivery date. All returned items must be in the original packaging and in the condition that they were shipped to you. Defective or damaged items can be returned for an exchange within 7 days of the delivery date. All returns require authorization BEFORE returning the item. If you refuse delivery of an order, we will deduct the return shipping charge from your refund.
